text: The 480s was a decade that began on 1 January 480 and ended on 31 December 489. It is distinct from the decade known as the 49th which began on January 1, 481 and ended on December 31, 490. ==Events== *481 – Clovis I becomes king of the Franks upon the death of Childeric I (or 482) *481 – Baekje, Silla, and Daegaya form an alliance against Goguryeo. *488 – Theodoric the Great becomes king of the Ostrogoths. *488 – Kavadh I succeeds Balash in Persia.
title: 480s
